scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && watchman watch-del-all
scripts.android:clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock && watchman watch-del-all
scripts.android:clean:init: bun run android:clean && npm install && npx jetify
scripts.ios:init: bun run clean && npm install && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.android:init: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock && bun install
scripts.android:build-aab: bun run clean:init && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew app:bundleRelease && bun run android:open
scripts.android:build-apk: bun run android:clean:init && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew app:assembleRelease && bun run android:open
scripts.android:run: bun run android:clean:init && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && bun run android
scripts.android:emu: watchman watch-del-all && emulator -avd Pixel_5_API_32 && bun run android
